physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Height 113.5 cm (SDS -3.36), weight 18.5 kg (BMI 14.4 kg/m²), head circumference 51.0 cm (centile 2.4). Thyroid function tests: FT4 37.6 pmol/liter (normal range 12.0–25.0), FT3 2.60 pmol/liter (normal range 3.6–8.5), TSH 1.4 mU/liter (normal range). Serum selenium low.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial height and weight were proportionately low for age. Height velocity improved during L-T3 treatment. Bone age advancement observed during treatment, narrowing the gap between chronological and bone age.
